column1: Warning: If you are purchasing a 3M N95 mask make sure you have the proper fit and are clean shaven. Ladies that includes you also. If you haven’t been fit tested you may still be exposed to airborne pathogens. Wonka Knows!! #COVID19 #CoronavirusOutbreak #Coronavirus
